name: OptionBuilder_hasOptionalArgTest
description: Unit tests for the hasOptionalArg functionality of the OptionBuilder class.

test_cases.name: testHasOptionalArg
test_cases.description: Tests the hasOptionalArg functionality of the OptionBuilder.

test_cases.name: testHasOptionalArgWithArgName
test_cases.description: Tests the hasOptionalArg functionality of the OptionBuilder with an argument name.

test_cases.name: testHasOptionalArgWithDescription
test_cases.description: Tests the hasOptionalArg functionality of the OptionBuilder with a description.

test_cases.name: testHasOptionalArgWithLongOpt
test_cases.description: Tests the hasOptionalArg functionality of the OptionBuilder with a long option.

test_cases.name: testHasOptionalArgWithRequired
test_cases.description: Tests the hasOptionalArg functionality of the OptionBuilder with a required flag.
